ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.job
Interface ElementaryJob

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
ChangePositionJob, ComposedImagingJob, CompositeJob, ContinuousImagingJob, DeviceSettingJob, FocusingJob, ImagingJob, ScriptingJob, StatisticsJob, WaitForUserJob, WaitJob
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElementaryJobAdapter
public interface ElementaryJob
extends java.rmi.Remote

Base class of all jobs.

Author:
Moritz Lang

Method Detail

getPositionInformation

int[] getPositionInformation()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the job's position information.

Returns:
Position information vector.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getWell

Well getWell()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the jobs' well or null, if job is not belonging to a well measurement.

Returns:
A two dimensional array, where the first element identifies the y-position of the well and the second the x, both starting at 0. Returns null if not a well measurement.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

executeJob

void executeJob(Microscope microscope)
                throws SettingException,
                       MicroscopeException,
                       DeviceException,
                       MicroscopeLockedException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                       java.rmi.RemoteException
Function which is called at every evaluation of the job. If this job contains child jobs, it is responsible to call their respective executeJob() methods. Should not be called directly by client applications.

Parameters:
microscope - Interface to control and get information of the microscope.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeException
DeviceException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.rmi.RemoteException

Called before the first evaluation of a job in a measurement. If this job contains child jobs, it is responsible to call their respective initializeJob() methods. Should not be called directly by client applications.

uninitializeJob

void uninitializeJob(Microscope microscope)
                     throws MicroscopeException,
                            DeviceException,
                            MicroscopeLockedException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException,
                            java.rmi.RemoteException
Called before the first evaluation of a job in a measurement. If this job contains child jobs, it is responsible to call their respective uninitializeJob() methods. Should not be called directly by client applications. There is no guarantee that this method is called. Usually it is called when the measurement stops regularly, e.g. by timing out or when the user invokes "stop measurement". However, it is not invoked if the measurement is interrupted or similar.

Parameters:
microscope - Interface to control and get information of the microscope.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
DeviceException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.rmi.RemoteException

getJobName

java.lang.String getJobName()
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a name/short description of the current job.

Returns:
Name/short description of job.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

setJobName

void setJobName(java.lang.String jobName)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                       MeasurementRunningException
Sets the name/short description of the current job. Usually, the default description of a job contains already sufficient information. However, for some measurement types it can be of advantage to rename certain jobs which have a specific meaning for the respective measurement.

Parameters:
jobName - Name/short description of the job.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException
